alert.note: Alert for Coastal Harris; Inland Harris; Montgomery; Northern Liberty; Southern Liberty (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 3:29PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Montgomery, southwestern Liberty and northeastern Harris Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 329 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Crosby, or near Barrett, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Liberty, Dayton, Barrett, Kingwood, Crosby, Plum Grove, Kenefick, Dayton Lakes, Lake Houston Dam, Lake Houston and eastern Atascocita. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Harris; Inland Harris; Montgomery; Northern Liberty; Southern Liberty
